message.body: The mom with the kid decided to sit behind me and he kept kicking my chair. Nope. I'm not sitting on the left side of the bus.
Aw man, what the hell kid. Sorry, darling haha. That aint the typical left-side experience. I promise. But, hope you leave soon! Love you, darling. So so much.
Oh no baby. They say behind me on the right side so I moved to the left side. She totally knew that's why too. I could see her staring at me when I left.
Ooooh. Oops ha. Well then enjoy the left side! And good. She shoulda stopped him
Seriously! It's okie though. I love you!!! Thank you for a wonderful weekend
Thank you! Talk to you when you get home, my love!
Okay!!
Now I'm sitting next to a guy who's watching Chinese running man and can't stop laughing next to me...womp womp.
Well dang, our day is just going in too different directions. I just got "thanks honey-beau"-ed for giving directions and im already well on my way home haha
Love ya! Told you ya shoulda stayed
I should've. We're still here. Haha
Ah yuk. Im sorry my love
It's okay. I think the driver is here. This guy won't stop laughing though.
He's irking me.
I believe it. Thats annoying. You watching something of your own?
Yes. But every time he laughs, he moves my seat up and down. Haha. Whatever. Maybe he'll stop.
He will. No chance he can keep that up for 3 hrs
Indeed
Almost home and didn't even fall asleep. Yay me!
Haha hope youre home now!! It's quite late enough!
Almost. Driving home now :D
Phew! Settle in home, my love :)
I had to call a dermatologist. My face is just awful! I can't go through this every month! No appointment until May 29th though :(
Im so sorry, my love :-( Hope it's going away.
It's not! My period is much lighter but my face is getting worse. It wouldn't be bad if my face were dry, but I have red patches literally all over.
Oh darling, im really really sorry. Glad you made an appointment then. Sorry you have to wait so long, but the redness will go away.
For 3 weeks and then it'll come back!!! But hopefully it'll be around for the derm appointment so he can see what he's dealing with. If not, I'm snapping a picture. Haha.
Hah do it. But baby, its normal. Dont you be walking around trying to hide your face. Youre beautiful.
I am. I'm hiding under a cap. :(
:-/ You do not have to, my love. I promise you
But I will :( just for the time being.
Ok my love. Get all those spots gone please please, and then take off that hat. No more hiding
I completely agree. Completely agree.
Mmmhm. You ok otherwise? Ok morning?
Yeah. Didn't get much studying done cause I was looking for derms, but whatever.
It's ok. You'll have time. Just get through class aand rush rush rush home
Yeah. I don't care though. Hehe. I just want to be done.
....braces are going on the 29th of May too! Literally getting braces and then going to the derm. Going to be a fun filled day.
